long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your college application essays with GradGPT—admission rubrics feedback, readability, and more.

GradGPT College Essay AI offers instant essay feedback—including alignment, structure, flow, tone, writing style, and more—to help you elevate your college applications. 

➤ Who is it for?
Students writing Ivy league supplemental essays (Stanford, Harvard, Yale, Princeton, Columbia, University of Pennsylvania...), common app personal statements or a statement of purpose of masters.

➤ How it works
GradGPT analyses your essay on rubrics that are important for Admission Officers and gives you insights on where to make improvements.

➤ Go beyond grammar 
Simple grammar checkers only give syntactic improvements, but writing a good essay takes a lot more. GradGPT essay coach stays as a brainstorming companion to help you build a winning essay. Try asking questions like: "suggest a strong hook to open the essay" or "how can I improve the conclusion?"

➤ What’s included?
• Essay checker
• Readability classification
• Tone and writing style suggestions
• Brainstorming companion

GradGPT is designed to work seamlessly in your browser—no switching tabs required. Use it alongside Google Docs, Notion or across the web on your favourite editor.

➤ Pricing
Free. No hidden costs / purchases.

➤ Get advanced scoring and generative AI support
Want more assistance on your essay? Try the GradGPT College Essay editor at www.gradgpt.com/college-essay-editor
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We value the trust our users put in us to keep their information safe and secure. The data entered in the essay reviewer is stored locally in your browser. We do not collect / store the essays, train our AI on it, share it with 3rd parties or use it for any purposes.
